me wasaredi (2013) pol pala laksha 95k ratapura situwima ilakkaya wi thibena bawa aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya pawasayi.me sandaha diwi nanguma wadasatahana yatathe pol pala laksha 30k beda dena athara elambaena sinhala hindu awuruddata samangamiwa sama pradeshiya lekam kottasayak thuladima aprel 05 sita 12 dakwa pawathwimata niyamitha diwi nanguma awurudu polawal 350 haraha janathawata awashya pol sahanadayi milakata labadima sandaha pol sanwardhana amathyanshaya samanga ekwa katayuthu karana lesa aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha adala niladharinta upades di
